verses.text: \w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* same David, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* restored again \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath reigned, let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* rejoice: let many islands \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad.

Clouds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* darkness \w are|strong="H3117"\w* round \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*: justice \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* establishment \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* throne.

\w A|strong="H6381"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* go before \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* burn \w his|strong="H3605"\w* enemies round \w about|strong="H3605"\w*.
\w His|strong="H3605"\w* lightnings \w have|strong="H3068"\w* shone forth \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* world: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth saw \w and|strong="H3068"\w* trembled.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* mountains melted \w like|strong="H8064"\w* wax, \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* presence \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* presence \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
\w The|strong="H6440"\w* heavens declared \w his|strong="H6440"\w* justice: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* all people saw \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* all confounded \w that|strong="H3068"\w* adore graven things, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* idols. Adore \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, all \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* angels:

Sion heard, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* glad. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda rejoiced, because \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy judgments, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* thou art \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* high \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: thou art exalted exceedingly \w above|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* gods.

\w You|strong="H0637"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* love \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, hate evil: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* preserveth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* souls \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w them|strong="H0559"\w* \w out|strong="H3559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sinner.

Light \w is|strong="H0776"\w* risen \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* just, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* right \w of|strong="H0776"\w* heart.

\w Rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, ye \w just|strong="H0834"\w*, \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remembrance \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holiness.
